required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on December 16, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Targeted Alpha-emitter Therapy of PRRT Naive Neuroendocrine Tumor Patients
clinical_study.official_title: A Phase 2 Open Label Study to Evaluate the Safety and Effectiveness of 212Pb-DOTAMTATE in PRRT Naive Subjects With Somatostatin Receptor Expressing Neuroendocrine Tumors

brief_summary.textblock: Multicenter Phase 2 study of 212Pb-DOTAMTATE enrolling adult subjects with positive somatostatin positive neuroendocrine tumors with no prior history of peptide receptor radionuclide therapy (PRRT naive)

detailed_description.textblock: In this open-label, multicenter, single-arm Phase 2 study, adult subjects with histologically confirmed NETs and positive somatostatin analog imaging, with no prior PRRT (PRRT naive) will be enrolled to receive 212Pb-DOTAMTATE 67.6 μCi/kg dose per cycle

primary_outcome.measure: Measurement of the objective response rate by Response Evaluation Criteria in Solid Tumors (RECIST) 1.1 criteria.
primary_outcome.description: The morphological imaging (CT/MRI) will be done before therapy and selected time points before therapy cycle to determine changes in the size of target lesions.

primary_outcome.measure: Number of patients with treatment-related adverse events as assessed by CTCAE v.4.0

secondary_outcome.measure: Measurement of the Median Progression free survival (mPFS)
secondary_outcome.description: PFS will be defined as the number of days from the first dose of 212Pb-DOTAMTATE to documented tumor progression per RECIST 1.1 criteria or death due to any cause.
OS will be defined as the number of days from the first dose of 212Pb-DOTAMTATE to the date of death due to any cause or the date of last contact (censored observations) at the data cut-off date.

secondary_outcome.measure: Measurement of Time to Tumor Progression (TTP)
secondary_outcome.description: This measurement will determine the time from start of treatment with 212Pb- DOTAMTATE until disease progression.

arm_group.description: investigational radiotherapeutic drug targeting somatostatin receptor-positive neuroendocrine tumors

intervention.description: 212Pb-DOTAMTATE is a radiolabeled derivative of octreotide targeting somatostatin positive neuroendocrine tumors

facility.name: Excel Diagnostics and Nuclear Oncology Center
